vector.dialog.instructions: Type to search across indexed records. Use arrow keys to navigate results.
vector.dialog.empty.hint: Type at least two characters to search indexed records.
vector.dialog.distance.title: Vector distance
vector.settings.statusEnabled: Embedding provider configured. Vector search is available.
vector.settings.statusDisabled: Embedding provider not configured. Vector search is disabled.
vector.settings.autoIndexingDescription: Keep vector embeddings in sync whenever records change.
vector.settings.autoIndexingLocked: Auto-indexing is locked by the DISABLE_VECTOR_SEARCH_AUTOINDEXING environment flag.

vector.settings.embeddingChangeWarningDe: Changing the embedding provider or model will require rebuilding all vector embeddings.

Require regenerating embeddings for all indexed records
vector.settings.embeddingChangeWarningNo: Vector search will be unavailable until reindexing completes.

vector.api.errors.recreateFailed: Failed to recreate vector table with new dimension.
vector.settings.reindexDescription: Regenerate embeddings for all indexed records using the current provider.
vector.settings.reindexWarning: This will make API calls to your embedding provider, which may incur costs depending on your plan.
